import React from'react';import{useState}from"react";import Caroussel from'../Caroussel/Caroussel';import Stars from'../Rating/rating';import Tags from'../Tags/tags';import Accordion from'../Accordion/accordion';import'./FicheLogement.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FicheContainer(_ref){let{logement}=_ref;const[avatarIsLoading,setAvatarIsLoading]=useState(true);const avatarLoaded=()=>{setAvatarIsLoading(false);};const accordionItems=[{title:'Description',content:logement.description},{title:'Equipements',content:logement.equipments// Mantenha como array para renderizar como lista
}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"fiche-container",children:[logement.pictures&&logement.pictures.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Caroussel,{pictures:logement.pictures}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"No pictures available for this logement"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logement",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logement__titre",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:logement.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:logement.location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tags,{tags:logement.tags})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("aside",{className:"logement__auteur",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logement__auteur__descritpion",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:logement.host.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:avatarIsLoading?"avatar":"avatar loaded",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logement.host.picture,onLoad:avatarLoaded,alt:logement.host.name,className:"host-picture"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Stars,{rating:logement.rating})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Accordion,{items:accordionItems})," "]})]});}export default FicheContainer;
